thread.title: LegalZoom Recognizes SecuritiesLawBlog.com as Attributable News Source
thread.title_full: LegalZoom Recognizes SecuritiesLawBlog.com as Attributable News Source - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: LegalZoom Recognizes SecuritiesLawBlog.com as Attributable News Source
text:
Legal & Compliance, LLC
WEST PALM BEACH, Florida , October 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
LegalZoom has recently included SecuritiesLawBlog.com as an attributable source for its article " The Advantages of a Subsidiary Corporation " by John Green , Demand Media. Founded in part by iconic attorney Robert Shapiro , LegalZoom.com is an online legal technology company that provides an array of online legal documents and services incorporation, trademark and registered agent services.
SecuritiesLawBlog.com was created by securities attorney Laura Anthony , founder of the corporate and securities law firm Legal & Compliance, LLC .
The source material, " Subsidiary Spin -O ffs " was originally published by Ms. Anthony on October 4, 2010 .
Securities attorney Laura Anthony was delighted and enthused that her written work was used as source material by such a highly-recognized source as LegalZoom.
"I am appreciative that SecuritiesLawBlog.com is being utilized by even more legal professionals as a bona fide news source," attorney Laura Anthony said. "I consider it a significant compliment that LegalZoom referenced SecuritiesLawBlog.com in their recent article."
SecuritiesLawBlog.com was launched by attorney Laura Anthony in 2009. Since then, the site has become a widely used and accepted source for news and information pertaining to corporate and securities law.
Legal & Compliance, LLC focuses on going public transactions, complex corporate transactions and ongoing legal support for both private and public companies. The firm has grown rapidly since its inception in 2001.
Securities attorney Laura Anthony and her experienced legal team provide ongoing corporate counsel to small and mid-size OTC issuers as well as private companies going public on the over-the-counter market, such as the OTCBB, OTCQB and OTCQX. Legal & Compliance, LLC is a comprehensive corporate, securities and business transactions law firm assisting clients in all aspects of commerce, including initial public offerings, reverse mergers, registered public offerings, exempt private offerings, all forms of complex corporate finance transactions, compliance with the over-the-counter market trading platforms such as OTCQB, compliance with FINRA and DTC, strategic planning for unique management and ownership issues, and broad-scope legal services. Laura Anthony, Esq. , is also the creator and author of SecuritiesLawBlog.com and the host of LawCast.com , The Securities Law Network.
